amendment.description: To require the Office of Management and Budget, the President, and the Department of Defense to submit detailed reports to Congress on effects of defense and nondefesne budget sequestration for fiscal year 2013.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2455 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2455 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S4385-4386) To require the Office of Management and Budget, the President, and the Department of Defense to submit detailed reports to Congress on effects of defense and nondefesne budget sequestration for fiscal year 2013.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2455 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2455 proposed by Senator Murray.
